property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Handmaid to reduce the cost of the next AVATAR character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the story phase, place Ambushing Ghoul on top of its owner's deck. Action: Pay 1 to put Ambushing Ghoul into play from your hand. Use this ability only if you control another GHOUL character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When this card would be revealed as the top card of your deck, put it into play and reveal the next card of your deck instead. (Limit 1 per turn.)

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Shadow Mage

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If an opponent wins a story to which Jean Deveraeux is committed, you choose whether or not to trigger the story's effect as if you had won it, instead of your opponent.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Toughness +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Attach Bayou Shaman to a domain as a resource to put another resource from that domain on top of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Wound Mi-Go Worker to reduce the cost of the next Mi-Go character you play this phase by X. X is the number of resources on any one of your drained domains. (Limit 1 per turn.)

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Loyal. Toughness +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a > character, Frenzied Ghoul gains @ # until the end of the phase. (Limit once per turn.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While you control only > or neutral cards, Keelut gains a @ icon and Chthonian and Monster characters you control gain a # icon.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Villainous. Toughness +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Baka enters play, wound another character you control and a character controlled by an opponent.

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Servitor. Dark Young.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When Baleful Dark Young would leave play, you may instead remove it from the game to choose a story. Then, the player with the most success tokens at that story must discard success tokens until he has an equal number of tokens as the player with the fewest success tokens at that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Characters with a printed cost of 3 or lower cost 3 to play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While it is NIGHT Rene Bonvillain gains INVULNERABILITY, FAST, and Action: Pay 2 to wound a character committed to the same story as Rene Bonvillain.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot have Attachment cards attached. Rend gains a # icon for each wound on it. Forced Response: After you commit Rend to a story, wound it.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Toughness +5. Fast.

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Monster. Gug.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you win a # struggle at a story to which Marsh Gug is committed, choose and wound a character.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Toughness +1.

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Serpent. Monster.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Smoke Serpent counts its icons at each story where you control a character with RESILIENT.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you succeed at a story where Mysterious Philanthropist was committed, put the top or bottom card of your deck into your hand.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Dangerous Bokor

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Sorcerer. Cultist.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Characters with a printed cost of 3 or less cannot commit to the same story as Lady Esprit.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Lord of the Mi-Go

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Servitor. Mi-Go.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to of the first Mi-Go you play each turn by X. X is the number of Mi-Go in your discard pile. You may play Mi-Go characters in your discard pile as though they were in your hand.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Toughness +1.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Lord of the Cemetary

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When you win a # struggle at a story where Baron Samedi is committed, instead of the normal struggle effect, wound each other character at that story.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Villainous. Resiliant.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Blasphemy in the Night Sky

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Ancient One.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Destroy all Day cards. Forced Response: After you play Yeb from your hand, each player chooses and sacrifices 1 card from play for each domain he controls with fewer than 3 resources.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Invulnerability. Villainous.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Father of Worms

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Ancient Chthonian enters play, search your deck for any number of Chthonian characters, reveal them, and shuffle your deck. Then, put the revealed cards on top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Servitor. Dark Young.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Dark Sargassum is committed to a story, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a > character, put it into play committed to a story. At the end of the phase, sacrifice that card.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: The Dark Mother

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Ancient One.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you play Shub-Niggurath, put into play all > characters attached to the domain you used to pay for for it.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Invulnerablity. Villainous. Resilient.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Ghoul Tunnels to choose a non-Ancient One character attached to one of your domains as a resource. Drain that domain and then put that character into play. At the end of the turn, if that character is still in play, discard it.

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Attachment. Item.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character. Attached character gains Toughness +1 and @ #.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Vieux Carre

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Reveal the top card of your deck until the end of the phase. If that card is a > character, choose one of its struggle icons, and add that icon to each character you control until the end of the phase. (Limit once per turn.)

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Attachment. Item.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character. It is Night. Destroy all Day cards. Attached character gains 1 $ icon for each opponent's character committed to the same story as it.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Last Landmark

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player needs 1 additional success token to win each story.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Dark Blessing

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Attachment. Ritual.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a domain. You may play resources from the attached domain as if they were cards in your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose and destroy a Location support card. Then, that support card's controller reveals cards from his deck until he reveals a Location support card. Set that card aside, and shuffle that deck. Then, puttheset aside support card on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Destroy each exhausted support card, if able. Then, exhaust each support card controlled by an opponent.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Remove all wounds from each character you control. Then, deal an equal number of wounds divided among a single opponent's characters.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After you win this conspiracy, name a subtype. Search your deck for any number of > characters with that subtype, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While this conspiracy is in play, each player must choose and wound a character he controls in order to commit characters to stories.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Death's Hand

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you win a story to which Ankou is committed, sacrifice him to remove all cards in a chosen player's discard pile from the game.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: The Crawling Chaos

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Ancient One.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may return an AVATAR character to your hand to reduce the cost to play Nyarlathotep by 3. Disrupt: When you succeed at a story to which Nyarlathotep is committed, sacrifice it to put an AVATAR character into play from your hand committed to an unresolved story, if able.

property.value: Villainous. Toughness +1. Resilient.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Ensorcelled Valise

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Attachment. Arttifact

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a player's deck. Action: Exhaust The Archmage's Attache to reveal the top card of attached deck until the end of the phase. While that card is revealed, you may play the revealed card as your next action, ignoring resource matching, as though it was in your hand. Card designed by 2013 North American Champion Tom Capor.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Finder of Lost Things

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Treat each support card's text box as if it were blank. Action: Choose a support card. That card ignores Gregory Lean's passive effect until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.value: Villainous. Resilient.

property.value: Elysian Fields

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Reveal the top card of your deck until the end of the phase. If that card is an ATTACHMENT support card, you may instead put it into play and attach it to a character of your choice (following all restrictions). (Limit once per turn.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Characters committed to the same story as The Bloody Tongue lose all TOUGHNESS.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Villainous. Resilient. Fast.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Reveal the top card of your deck until the end of the phase. If that card is a [Cthulhu] event, while it is revealed, you may play it as if it were in your hand. (Limit once per turn.)

property.value: The Order of the SIlver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Reveal the top card of your deck until the end of the phase. If that card is a SORCERER character, put it on the bottom of your deck to choose a character of lower printed cost and return it to its owner's hand. (Limit once per turn.)
